PROJECT DETAILS 
 
Title 
: Design and Fabrication of water level maintainer for a basin type solar still 
Description : To remove the salt from water by soalr distillation and using as normal water in the 
solar still. Here the water level maintainer is designed for giving the consant water level to solar still. 
So that the efficiency of solar still will be increase. 
 
Title 
: Development of self lubricating system for the bearings in hydraulic press 
Description : To decrease the friction between the bearing surfaces in hydraulic press, the self 
lubrication system is generated. By using this method, The wear of bearing will be decrease as well as 
life of bearing will be increase. So that, The efficiency of the hydraulic press will be increased and 
loss of cost will be decrease.
